original_text: You worship your idols among the big trees, and you have sex at the same time. 57: They worshipped false gods that they thought would give them many children. So they had sex in a wrong way when they met together. You kill your children as sacrifices to your false gods. You do that beside streams and in caves among the rocks. You worship your idols among the big trees,
korean_text: 너희가 상수리나무 사이, 모든 푸른 나무 아래에서 음욕을 피우며 골짜기 가운데 바위 틈에서 자녀를 도살하는도다

sentences.original_text: You worship your idols among the big trees
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 큰 나무들 사이에서 너의 우상을 숭배한다

sentences.original_text: and you have sex at the same time
that they thought would give them many children
So they had sex in a wrong way
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 잘못된 방식으로 성관계를 했다

sentences.original_text: You kill your children as sacrifices
and in caves among the rocks
You worship your idols among the big trees
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 큰 나무들 사이에서 너의 우상을 숭배한다
